snippet.title: Mission in Snowdriftland - Kickstarter Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
"Mission in Snowdriftland" is back thanks to your support 🙏🏻

Get it now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515200/Mission_in_Snowdriftland/

_________________________________________________________________

❄️ For information about the game and more, please visit the official website:
https://www.mission-in-snowdriftland.com/

🐧 Interact with the community and devs, chat about Pinkus and Mammoths:
https://discord.gg/yw3wv5QGNA

✨ Regular updates, short and compact:
https://twitter.com/tons_of_bits

👀 From pixel art to fanart, here you will find tons of eyecandy:
https://www.instagram.com/tons_of_bits/

💙 Family, friends and Snowmen, please go here:
https://www.facebook.com/tonsofbits
